attributes.action: travel companies refund customers who are afraid to travel amid coronavirus
attributes.additional_details: Because it is discusting that these company's are profiteering at these desperate times when people are afraid,
attributes.background: People who are afraid to travel on pre covid-19 booked holidays are loosing all their hard ernt money. The travel company's will not cancel any trips as if they do they have to refund, they will happily let thier customers potentially die rather than refund them, government should make this happen.

rejection.details:
Individual travel companies are responsible for setting policies and making decisions about refunds.

You could start a petition calling on the Government to create a fund to reimburse people who have lost money because they have cancelled plans due to coronavirus.
